pr_title: EBP: Improve URL attachment dialog styles

timeline.message: Make attachment dialog styles also apply to the URL dialog

timeline.bodyText: It'd seem here that the intention is to match that of the same classes when under .fileHandler. As a result, a mixin should be used to keep things DRY and avoid copy pasta.
timeline.author: edalex-ian

timeline.message: Add mixin for the common styles under the edit dialogs

timeline.bodyText: A query on the name here. editDialog seems very generic, is that the intention - i.e. that it could be used on any of the dialogs for editing? Or, should it be slightly more specific like editAttachmentDialog?
timeline.author: edalex-ian

replies.bodyText: It should mainly have been for editing attachments, yeah. I've renamed to editAttachmentDialogStyles.
replies.author: SammyIsConfused
